Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>うっ...<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>あんた こんなやつに<CD>バカにされて くやしくないの!?<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>いじを 貝せてやれ<CD><&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>とっても 楽しいですよ♥<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>わ 分かったよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Uuw...<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,02>Aren't you fed up with that guy looking down on us?<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>Show him what you've got, <&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>It's really fun ♥<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>F-fine.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>こ ここかな...?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I-is this it...?

Original: ガシャン!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>あっちゃ-<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>おいおい<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,05>だいじょうぶですかっ!
Translated: <f09>Crash<f08>!<f00><CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>Ouch...<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>Hey, hey!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,05>Are you alright!?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>だ だって ぼく 空をとぶ<CD>はやい のリものって にがてだし<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>それが おれの ライバルの言う<CD>セリフか!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>はああ そう言えば あんた<CD>ひこうきも こわいのよね<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>しょせん 地上人だって ことか<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>あ! でも あんた<CD>「風のつばさ」は ヘいきじゃない!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>メダロットは ベつだよ<CD>ぼく メダロットは しんじられる<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>「風のつばさ」?<CD>あんな おもちゃに のっているのか<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>ぼくには メダロットが 1番なんだ!<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>バカには つき合ってられん<CF><D1>ここを かんこうしたけリゃ<CD>勝手に やるんだな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>I-I'm not good with things that fly that fast.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>Is that something my rival should be saying!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>Haa, now that I think about it, you were acting scared on the plane.<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>What can you expect from a surface dweller.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>Ah! But you were fine with using the <f02>Wings of Wind!<f00><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Medarots are different. I believe in Medarots.<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>The <f02>Wings of Wind? <f00><D3>You rode on a toy like that?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>For me, Medarots are the best!<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>I can't put up with you idiots.<CF><D1>If you wanna go sightseeing, you guys are on your own.

Original: <@RL,Erika,02>あんたなんか こっちから<CD>おことわリですよ-だ! ベ--っ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,02>You're the one that we can't stand being around ! Bleh!

Original: <@RL,Erika,06>あ-あ 何だか しらけちゃった!<CF><D1>気分てんかんに いろんな所<CD>しゅざいして まわろ-<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>そう言えば あんた「風のつばさ」は?<CD>前は よく 使ってたじゃない<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>おぼえてない? メダロッチのデ-タが<CD>きえた時 いっしょに きえちゃって<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>あ そっか...あたしのも<CD>きえちゃったもんね<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>でも はかせなら もってるかもね!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,06>Aah! Now my mood is ruined!<CF><D1>Let's go around and find some news to cover to change things up.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>Come to think of it, what about your <f02>Wings of Wind?<f00><D3>You used to use it pretty often, right?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>Don't you remember? It was lost with the data on the Medarotches.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>Ah, that's right... I lost mine then too.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>But maybe the professor has some!

Original: <@RL,Koji,01>じゃあ おれは ロボトルの<CD>あいてを さがすっ!!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>では わたしは おさんぽでも
Translated: <@RL,Koji,01>Well, I'm gonna go find people to robattle!!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>And I am going for a stroll.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,03>ぼくって うんどうしんけい<CD>ないのかな...<CF><D1>「風のつばさ」かぁ...<CF><D1>アリカも「はかせなら」って言ってたし<CD>何も することないから<CF><D1>はかせの とこでも 行ってみよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,03>I wonder if my reflexes just aren't good enough...<CF><D1><f02>Wings of Wind<f00>, huh...<CF><D1>Arika said that "the professer may have it" and there's nothing else to do, so let's go check where the professor is.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ぼくはお金持ちさ! うらやましいだろ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I'm a rich man! You must be jealous?

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>あ-ら おくさま 今日も<CD>おきれい ですこと オホホ
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>Oh my, your wife sure is pretty today. Ohoho...

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>わたしなんて まだまだ<CD>そういう おくさまこそ オホホ
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>I'm a long way off from being a wife like that. Ohoho...

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>おや? きみは 地上人かい?<CD>ふくのセンスが いまいちだね<CF><D1>ほら ぼくのふくを貝て! そリゃもう<CD>ナウなヤングに バカウケさっ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>What's this? A surface-dweller, are you? Your sense of style is off.<CF><D1>Just look at my coat! I'm gonna be a bit hit with the youth, dont'cha know!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ごようがなければ お引きとリを
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>If there's nothing I can do for you, please leave.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ようこそ おいでくださいました
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Welcome! Please, come on in.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>こんごの かぶの じょうせいは...
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>The status of our stock is...

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ぼくは ゆうとうせい だから<CD>学校の じゅぎょうなんかじゃ<CF><D1>もの足リないのさ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I'm an honours student, so simple schoolwork... <CF><D1>...isn't enough for me.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>お兄さま そこ まちがえてますわ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>I believe my big brother made a mistake.

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>家の中でも おしゃれは かかせないわ
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>It's important to dress well even at home.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>そうじなんて メダロットに<CD>やらせれば いいのに!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>It's better to get the Medarots to do things for you like cleaning!

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>ほら そこ! まだ ごみが<CD>のこってますわよ!
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>Look over there! You left some trash!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>うむ こいつは うまい!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Uh-huh, this guy's good!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>うわ! なんか 動いてる!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>お金持ちって ふつうの リょうリじゃ<CD>まんぞく できなくなっちゃうの?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Whoa! It's moving!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>So, rich people can't just be satisfied with ordinary cooking?

Original: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>リょうリハ 楽しいデスヨ
Translated: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>COOKING IS FUN!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>どうだい? きみ ちょっと ぼくの<CD>メダロットと しょうぶしてみない?<CF><D1>ま 地上の人が ぼくに勝てるわけは<CD>ないけどね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Well? Wouldn't you like to play with my Medarot?<CF><D1>But there's no way a surface-dweller like you could beat me.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ぬぬ! なかなか やるじゃないかっ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Wow! You're not half-bad!

Original: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>ボッチャン 少しは 休ませて 下さい
Translated: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>Please let me rest, young master.

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>ふう うちのボッチャンは きびしいね
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>Sigh... The young master is relentless.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>うちの むすこ メダロット研究いんに<CD>なリたいらしいのだが あそこは<CF><D1>変わった人が 多いからねえ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>My son wants to be a Medarot researcher.<CF><D1>But all the people there are so strange.

Original: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>きびしい人だけれど わたし<CD>おくさまのこと すきだから<CF><D1>おくさまのために がんばリますわ
Translated: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>The lady is very strict, but I do like her.<CF><D1>So I'll keep giving it my all for her.

Original: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>あなたは おそうじとか すき?
Translated: <@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>Do you like to clean?

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>何回 言えば 分かるのかしらっ!<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>もうしわけございません おくさま<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>あ- もう やだやだ!<CD>こんなメダロット 早くすてて<CF><D1>新はつばいの お手つだい<CD>メダロットでも 買いましょっ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>How many times do I have to tell you?!<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>I'm sorry, my lady.<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>Argh! This won't do at all! Get rid of this Medarot at once!<CF><D1>Someone will go buy a new assistant Medarot!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>何回 言えば 分かるのかしらっ!<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>もうしわけございません おくさま<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>あ- もう!<CF><D1>...まぁ いいわ<CD>メダロットも かぞくの<CF><D1>いちいんなんだし<CF><D1>気長に そだてて<CD>いくしか ないわねぇ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>How many times do I have to tell you?!<CF><D1><@RL,FemaleMedabot,00>I'm sorry, my lady.<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>Argh, no!<CF><D1>...Well, I guess even a Medarot is<CF><D1>a member of the family.<CF><D1>I'll just have to raise her with patience.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>何なの? あなた そこどきなさい!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>What is it? Please move over there, out of my way.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>ロボロボ団 1分の1スケ-ル!<CD>何なんだ これ?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06> It's a RoboRobo at a 1/1 scale!<D3>What is this?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>知ってる? 地上で 大人気の<CD>「ロボロボさん」人形 ほしいよな-
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Did you know? I'd love to have one of those <f02>RoboRobo<f00> dolls that are popular among surface-dwellers.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ついに 手に入れたぞ!<CF><D1>今 地上で1番 人気のヒ-ロ-!<CD>「セレクト団」人形!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>何か ちがうんだよなぁ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I finally got it!<CF><D1>The world's most popular hero!<D3>A <f02>Select Gang <f00>doll!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>There's something wrong here...

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ここに 「ボロボロ団」っていう<CD>人気の 人形を かざるんだって
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>We display the popular <f02>RoboRobo Gang<f00> dolls here.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>これが 人気の「ヘベレケ隊」?<CD>このス-ツ かなリイケてますわ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>This is the popular <f02>Hebereke Unit<f00><D3>Their suits are so stylish!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ち 地上の テクノロジ-も<CD>あなどれないわね びっくリしたわ<CF><D1>あんなに 人形が リアルに動くなんて<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>人形じゃ ないよぅ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>I-I'm surprised you don't look down on surface-dweller technology.<CF><D1>It's amazing how real the dolls are.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>They're not dolls!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>こどもに「ノロノロ団」の 人形を<CD>買ってくれと せがまれたよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>My kid was pestering me to buy a <f02>Noronoro Gang<f00> doll.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>こどもに ねだられたから<CD>「ボロボロ団」の人形を 買ったよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>I bought a<f02> RoboRobo Gang<f00> doll because my kid begged me for it.

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>パパ! 「ノロノロ団」じゃなくて<CD>「ショボショボ団」よ!
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>Papa! That's not <f02>NoroNoro Gang!<f00> That's <f02>ShoboShobo Gang!

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>パパ! 「ボロボロ団」じゃなくて<CD>「ヨボヨボ団」よ!
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>Papa! That's not <f02>RoboRobo Gang! <f00>That's <f02>YoboYobo Gang!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>もう メダロットで あそぶの<CD>あきちゃったよ だから そろそろ<CF><D1>あの メダロット すてよ-っと<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>何だよ その 「すてる」ってのは!<CF><D1><@RL,Man3,00>ぼくの メダロットだ! どうしようが<CD>ぼくの勝手だろ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>そんな...
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I'm so tired of playing with Medarots.<CF><D1>Get rid of that Medarot!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>What do you mean, "get rid of"?!<CF><D1><@RL,Man3,00>It's my Medarot! I can do what I like!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>You...

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>やっぱリ メダロットを すてるのは<CD>やめに するよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Fine, I won't get rid of the Medarot.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,03>まだ 新しい ティンペットだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,03>That's still a new Tinpet.

Original: <@RL,FlyingMedabot,00>ひさしぶリに パ-ツを つけて<CD>もらいました
Translated: <@RL,FlyingMedabot,00>It's been a while since I've had parts added.

Original: <@RL,Erika,01>あっ! いた いたっ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,01>Ah! There you are!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>あ アリカ どうしたの?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>面白い じょうほうを 手に入れたよ<CF><D1>シラサギレイクの 右のさんばしから<CD>コインを なげると<CF><D1>ねがいごとが かなうらしいのよ<CD>行ってみましょ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ねがいごとかぁ よし 行ってみよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Ah, Arika. What is it?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>I got my hands on some interesting info.<CF><D1>Apparently, if you throw a coin from the right-hand bridge on Egret Lake, then your wishes will come true! Let's go try it out!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Wishes, huh... Alright, let's go.<D3>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>うわ- はしの下に いっぱいコインが<CD>おちてる!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>さっそく ねがいごと しましょ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Woah, there are so many coins under the bridge!<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>Make a wish right away!

Original: <@RL,Erika,05>早くっ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,05>Hurry up!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>え 何が?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>早く コイン なげてよっ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>え-っ!? ぼくが なげるの!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>あたリまえじゃ ないの<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>アリカ...ケチになったね...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Eh, what is it?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>Hurry and throw a coin!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Eeh!? I'm throwing one!?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>Isn't that obvious?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>Arika... You're really stingy...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,03>はい なげたよ<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>じゃ おねがい しましょ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,03>There, I threw it.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>Alright, let's make a wish!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>あれ-? おかしいな<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>どうしたの?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>お金が ないんだ<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>は- 分かった あたしが なげるわ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Huh? That's strange...<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>What is it?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>I don't have any money.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,05>Haa, fine. I'll throw one in.

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>んで <&BUF0A>は<CD>何を おねがい したの?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>「カラスと 友だちに なリたい」って<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>友だちっ!? やめときなさいよ<CD>あんなやつと なんて...
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>So <&BUF0A>, what did you wish for?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>to "become friends with Crow."<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,07>Friends!? You should give up, being friends with someone like that...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>アリカッ! ぼくらは 本当の<CD>カラスを 知らないだけなんだ<CF><D1>もっと 話し合えば<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>はいはい 分かった 分かった<CD>あんたは ほんと 友だちバカね!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>友だちバカ??? まあいいや それで<CD>アリカは 何て おねがい したの?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>人の おねがいを 聞くなんて<CD>ヤボなこと しないでよね!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Arika! We haven't gotten to know the real Crow. If we talk more, I'm sure we'll understand each other better.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,06>Yeah, yeah. I get it, I get it. You really are a fool for friends.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>A fool for friends??? Well fine then, what did you wish for, Arika?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>Don't do something rude like asking about people's wishes!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>アリカは 聞いたくせに...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>But you asked me...

Original: <@RL,Erika,04>言いわすれてたけど 全部で 10回<CD>コインを なげたら<CF><D1>ねがいごとが かなうんだって<CD>あと9回 あんたに まかせるわ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04>I forgot to say, but if you throw a coin ten times, then your wish will come true! You can handle the other nine times!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>のこリ 9回...ぼくが なげるの?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>まあ いいや...<CD>あとで また 来てみよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>I'm supposed to throw in... nine more!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>Well, whatever...<D3>I'll come back later.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>とは 言っても 何も しないで<CD>ねがいごとが かなうなんてこと<CF><D1>ないと 思うから<CD>友だちになるなら 話を しなきゃ<CF><D1>カラス どこかな 学校かな?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>That said, I don't think that wishes will come true if you do nothing. If I want to be friends, I have to make an effort and talk to him. I wonder, would Crow be at school right now?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>カモメちゃん!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>やあ <&BUF0A>くん<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>カラスって どこの きょうしつかな?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>もう1つ上のかいの 右下だよ<CF><D1>もし いなかったら<CD>公園の さんばしだと 思うよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>あリがとう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Gull!<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>Heya, <&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Which classroom is Crow in?<CF><D1><@RL,Boy2,00>One floor up, on the bottom right.<CF><D1>If he's not there, he could be on the wharf in the park.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Thanks!

Original: <@RL,Boy2,00>兄さんを よろしく たのむよ
Translated: <@RL,Boy2,00>Please take care of my big brother.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>つうしんきょういくが はったつした<CD>おかげで あんまリ せいとが<CF><D1>学校に来なくなったの さびしいわぁ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Thanks to the development of long-distance education, students don't come to school as much.<CF><D1>I miss them around here...

Original: <@RL,Man,00>きみ イエス か ノ- で答えてくれ<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>You, answer with "oui" or "non."<*04>

Original: <@RL,Man,00>はい ではない イエス だ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>"Yes" isn't "oui"!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>いいえ ではない ノ- だ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>"No" isn't "non"!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>きみは ほうかご のこって 先生と<CD>えいごの ベんきょうを しましょう<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>なんだか むちゃくちゃだなぁ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>You, stay after school to study French with your teacher.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Isn't that a bit absurd?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>いねむリ してませんよ ぐ- ぐ-
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I'm not dozing off. <f08>Zzzz zzzz.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>もう じゅぎょう中に いねむリを<CD>するなよ...って おい おきろ-!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Come on, don't doze off in class again... Hey, get up!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>さいきん すっかリ せいとたちが<CD>なまいきに なっちゃって!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>The students are turning into such brats lately!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>また ドアが こわれちゃったよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>The door is broken again.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ここのドア いつも こわれるんだよな
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>This door is always breaking.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>まちなさい! ワタリドリくん!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Wait! Wataridori!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>あ カラス!<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>どけ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Ah, Crow!<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>Outta the way!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>んもうっ! また!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あの すみませんっ!<CD>カラスくん どうしたんですか?<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>しょっちゅうなのよ<CD>じゅぎょう中に とび出していくの<CF><D1>頭は いい子なんだけど<CD>きょうちょうせいの かけらもないわ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Geez! Again!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Uhm, Excuse me!<D3>What's up with Crow?<CF><D1><@RL,Lady2,00>This happens all the time! He always runs out during class. Even though he's a smart kid, he doesn't have a single thought about being cooperative!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>カラスのやつ 学校でも<CD>かなリ 勝手気ままなんだな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Even at school that Crow does whatever he likes.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>だ-れも 来てない
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Nobody came here.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>せいとが 学校に来た! ヤッホ-!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Students came to school! Yahoo!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>1人で じゅぎょう うけても<CD>つまんないから 学校にきちゃったよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I came to school because I didn't want to do lessons by myself.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>やだ 学校 楽しいわ<CD>あしたも 来てみようかしら?
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>No way, school is fun! <D3>I wonder should I come tomorrow as well?

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>学校に来ない人には 学校のよさなんて<CD>分からないわ<CF><D1>わるい所しか 貝ない人には<CD>これからの 人生つまらないわよ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Those who don't come to school will never understand the importance of school.<CF><D1>People who only see the bad things in life will grow up to find it boring!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>そんなことも 分からないのですか?<CD>それでは 先生と みとめませんよ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Don't you understand those things?<D3>Then you won't be recognized as a teacher.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ひ-! むずかしいっ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Ack! It's too hard!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>あの子 わたしたちの きょういくじゃ<CD>もの足リないんだって きびしいわぁ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>That girl is relentless. She says our education isn't enough!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>人という字はね 人と人がだね...
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>The word for mankind consists of the words "man" and "kind"...

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>先生が言うにはね 「人」の字って<CD>人と人とが ささえ合っているって<CF><D1>いみらしいけど ぼくは 人をささえて<CD>くれるのは お金だけだと 思うよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>でも お金じゃ 買えないものだって<CF><D1><@RL,Man3,00>ないね!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>The teacher says that the word symbolizes how man must be kind to one another, but I feel like the only thing people are kind to is money.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>But money can't buy everything.<CF><D1><@RL,Man3,00>I disagree!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>パパに せいせきが上がるまで<CD>ロボトルきんしって 言われちゃった
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Papa banned me from robattles until I get my grades up!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>あなたの そのチョンマゲ すてきね♥
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Your topknot is great♥

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>このクラス つかれるわぁ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>I'm bored of this class...

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>カラスくんって じゅぎょうを<CD>とび出したあと よく<CF><D1>スカイパ-クに 行ってるみたいだわ<CD>こまったものね...
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Crow often ditches class to go to the Sky Park.<CF><D1>What a bothersome boy...

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>カラスくん じゅぎょうを ぬけ出す<CD>回数が 少なくなったわ<CF><D1>何か あったのかしら?
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>Crow is still skipping class just as much.<CF><D1>I wonder what he's doing?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>テストの点が下がった?<CD>うひ-! ママに しかられるぅ-!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>My test points dropped?<D3>Eeek! I'll be scolded by Mom!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>カラスくんは じゅぎょうを<CD>さぼってるのに ぼくよリ せいせきが<CF><D1>いいんだ なぜ?
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Crow skips class and still has better grades than me?<CF><D1>How on earth?!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>家で じゅぎょうが うけられると<CD>いっても やっぱリ 学校には<CF><D1>出て来るベきだと 思うんだけどね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Even if you can take your lessons at home...<CF><D1>I think it's still better to come to school.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>学校に来る人が 少ないと思いません?<CF><D1>それって 自分の家でも じゅぎょうが<CD>うけられるから なんですけどね
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>There aren't many people coming to school?<CF><D1>I'm sure it's because they're doing their lessons at home.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>カラスくんって 女子のあいだで<CD>かなリの人気が あリますのよ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Crow seems to be popular among the girls.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>さいきん カラスくんの ひょうじょう<CD>少し やさしくなったと 思わない?<CF><D1>前の ツンツンしてた カラスくんも<CD>かっこよかったけどね
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Do you think Crow has started looking more gentle, lately?<CF><D1>But his aloofness from before was much more attractive!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ひさしぶリに 学校に来たけど<CD>先生も せいとも だれもいないんだ
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>It's been so long since I was in school, but now the teachers and students aren't here!

Original: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>デンゴンヲ 1ケン ウケテイマス<CF><D1><@RL,Man,00>みんなが 家でじゅぎょう うけるから<CD>先生も 家から おしえます
Translated: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00><f02>RECEIVING A MESSAGE.<f00><CF> <D1><@RL,Man,00>Everyone can take lessons at home, so the teachers will teach from home too.

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>今日は 何について 話し合おうか
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>What will we talk about today?

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>地上人って びんぼうだそうよ<CD>お金がないって どういう気分かしら
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Surface-dwellers seem to be so poor. I wonder how they cope with having no money?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>このヘやに ゴキブリが 出るようだ<CD>ゴキブリは 地上人のペットだって<CF><D1>聞いたことがあるよ<CD>きみの家にも いるんだろ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>た たしかにいるけど<CD>ペットじゃ ないよっ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>There seems to be a cockroach in this room.<CF><D1>I heard surface-dwellers keep cockroaches as pets. Do you have any?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Well, y-yes, but they're not our pets!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>で どのぐらい かってんの?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>何を?<CF><D1><@RL,Man3,00>ゴキブリを<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>だから ペットじゃないって!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Well, how much to buy one?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>To buy what?<CF><D1><@RL,Man3,00>A cockroach.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>They aren't pets!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ここは せいとかいしつだ<CD>学園のル-ルは ここで きめている<CF><D1>じゅうような ことは 先生に<CD>まかせては いられないからね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>This is the student council chamber, where we decide the rules of campus.<CF><D1>We can't leave all the important things to the teachers!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>コインが たくさん おちている<CD>こういうのは ひろっちゃ だめだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>So many coins have been dropped. You shouldn't pick them up, though.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>カラス ここにいたんだ<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>地上人 お前に 気やすく 名前を<CD>よばれる おぼえはない<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>じゃあ 何て よベば いい?<CF><D1>それに ぼくは 地上人じゃなくて<CD><&BUF0A>だよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>There you are, Crow.<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>Surface dweller, I don't remember allowing you to call me by name.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Then what should I call you?<CF><D1>Besides, I'm not "Surface Dweller," I'm <&BUF0A>.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ねえ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Hey!

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>ついてくるな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>カラスって この場所 すきなんだろ?<CD>カモメちゃんに 聞いたよ<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>よけいなことを<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ねえ どうして こっちむいて<CD>しゃベって くれないのさ?<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>お前は なぜ おれに かかわる?<CD>何が 目あてだ 地上人<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>「きみと 友だちに なリたい!」<CD>っていう リゆうじゃ ダメかな?<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,03>...!
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>Quit following me.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>You like this place, don't you, Crow?<D3>I heard it from Gull.<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>Mind your business.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Hey, why don't you turn here and talk to me?<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>Why are you concerning yourself with me? What are your intentions, surface dweller.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>"I want to be friends with you!" is that a good enough reason?<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,03>...!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>あ! こっちむいた!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Ah! You turned this way!

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>おれが そうリの むすこだからか?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>「そうリの むすこ」なんかじゃ<CD>なかった方が 気楽なんだけどね<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>バカには つき合ってられん
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>Is it because I'm prime minister's son?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>I'd be more at ease if you <f02>weren't<f00> "the prime minister's son" though.<CF><D1><@RL,Crow,00>I don't have time to spend with fools.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>おこらせたかな?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04><&BUF0A>-!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Was it something I said?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04><&BUF0A>~!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>アリカ どうしたの?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,01>あこがれの「スカイTV」の<CD>貝学きょかが おリたの!<CF><D1>行ってみましょ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>What is it, Arika?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,01>We've got permission to check out <f02>Sky TV!<f00><CF><D1>Let's go!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「スカイTV」って 言ったら<CF><D1>「週刊メダロット」を<CD>ほうえいしてる TVきょくだ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>行ってみよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>She said <f02>Sky TV.<f00><CF><D1>That's where <f02>Medarot Weekly<f00> is broadcasted from!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>Let's go!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ぼくは カラスと 話がしたいんだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I want to talk to Crow.

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>さわがしいやつらだ
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>What a noisy bunch.

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>くだらない せかいだ みんな<CD>やすっぽい 作リものの せかいで<CF><D1>ママゴトして まんぞくしてやがる<CD>こんなとこ なくなっちまえばいい<CF><D1><@RL,Gillgirl,01>あ-ら そうリの むすこさんの<CD>ことばとは 思えないですわね
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>This shitty world where everyone is satisfied playing house in this garish and fake world. <D3>This place should should disappear.<CF><D1><@RL,Gillgirl,01>Oh my, to think that such words are coming from the prime minister's son.

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>...お前らか さいきん この町に<CD>入リこんだ ゴキブリというのは<CF><D1><@RL,Gillgirl,01>お-ほほほほ<CD>言ってくださいますわね!<CF><D1>そんなことよリ わたくしたちと<CD>手を租みませんこと?
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>...You guys, should I assume you are the cockroaches that have infiltrated this town?<CF><D1><@RL,Gillgirl,01>Ohohoho,<D3>What a thing to say!<CF><D1>More importantly, what say you join forces with us?

Original: <@RL,Crow,00>なるほどな<CF><D1>ベつに 面白くも ないが<CD>たいくつは しのげるかもな
Translated: <@RL,Crow,00>I see.<CF><D1>Doesn't sound particularly interesting, but I suppose I can endure the boredom.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>今 ロボロボ団が いたような...<CD>気のせい だよね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I think I saw some RoboRobos just now...<D3>I must be imagining things.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>ここで ズ-ムアップだ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Zoom in here!

Original: <@RL,Man,00>さつえい中だから 話しかけないで
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Don't talk to me while I'm taking pictures.

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>ここは しリょう室よ
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>This is the archive room.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>きょかが おリてるから 入っていいよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>You were given permission so you can come in.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>あ- ダメダメ! 貝学の きょかが<CD>ないと 中に入っちゃ ダメだよ!
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>Ah, no, no! If you don't have credentials, you can't go in there!

Original: <@RL,Erika,04>ここがあのスカイTVね!<CF><D1>今 やってるのは「週刊メダロット」の<CD>うら番租「メダロット.パラダイス」<CF><D1>つうしょう「メダパラ」よ!<CD>でも あんまリ 人気ない みたい
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04>This is Sky TV!<CF><D1>Right now, the show that's on is the one in <f02>Medarot Weekly's<f00> competing timeslot, <f02>Medarot Paradise,<f00> or <f02>MedaPar<f00>" for short!<D3>It doesn't seem to bevery popular though.

Original: <@RL,Erika,04>やっぱ ほんものの テレビきょくは<CD>はくリょくが ちがうわ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04>It seems that the real TV stations don't have as much impact as they should!

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>早く ちょうさ して来てよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>何で ぼくが ちょうさ するの?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>だって あたしは スカイTVの<CD>しゅざいで いそがしいもん!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>Quick, come look at this.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Why should I look at it?<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,00>Because I'm busy gathering material for Sky TV!

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>ちょっと まって!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>Hold it!

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>さっき しいれた じょうほうだけど<CD>なんだか ライチョウ学園で<CF><D1>大変なことが おきてるんだって!<CD>あたし 今 いそがしいから<CF><D1>あんた ちょうさ してよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>え!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>I just got word that something big is going down at Raicho Institute!<D3>I'm busy right now, so I need you to investigate.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Eh!?

Original: <@RL,Man,00>こうひょうほうえいちゅうの<CD>「週刊メダロット」は<CF><D1>この ほうそうきょくから<CD>ほうえいして いるんだよ
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>The official <f02>Weekly Medarot<f00> program is<CF><D1>broadcast from this station.

Original: <@RL,Clerk,00>今日は あたらしい お友だちを<CD>しょうかい しま-す!
Translated: <@RL,Clerk,00>Today I'll introduce our new friends!

Original: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>ボクは ふゆう型メダロットの<CD>「ふゆゆん」だよ-!<CF><D1>よろしくぅぅ!
Translated: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>I'm <f02>Fuyuyun<f00>, the floating type Medarot!<CF><D1>Nice to meet you!

Original: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>ボクは ふゆう型メダロットの<CD>「ふよん」だよ-!<CF><D1>よるぉぉしくぅぅ!
Translated: <@RL,FloatingMedabot,00>I'm <f02>Fuyon, <f00>the floating type Medarot!<CF><D1>Nice to meet'cha!

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>あの ヤロ- 何が 「ふゆゆん」だ!<CD>それなら おれは 「たきゃくん」で<CF><D1>...むむ? かわいくないっ!
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>That one said he's Fuyuyun or somethin', right? I guess I'll be <f02>Takyakun<f00>, then!<CF><D1>...What d'ya mean it doesn't sound nice?

Original: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>あの ヤロ- 何が 「ふよん」だ!<CD>名前を 変えただけじゃね-か!<CF><D1>それなら おれは 「たきゃくん」で<CD>...むむ? 変わってない!
Translated: <@RL,MultiLeggedMedabot,00>That one is Fuyon or somethin' now! Did he just change his own name?!<CF><D1>Then you can call me <f02>Takyakun!<f00> ...What? No, I'm not changing it!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>さあ 次の 番租の じゅんびよ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady2,00>All right, prepare for the next round!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>ケンカなんて やばん人のすることだね
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Leave the fighting to the uncivilized folk.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ケンカですって こわいですわ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Fighting? How frightening!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>2人とも やめなさいよ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Cut it out you two!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ふだんは すっごく なかよしなの
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>And to think, they're usually good friends...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>なにか 言いあらそっているようだ<CD>むこうにまわれば 聞こえるかな?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It seems like they're arguing about something. Can you hear it if you go around the back?

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>お前 おれの マスクメロン<CD>とっただろ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>You took my muskmelon!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>おれじゃないよ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I did not!

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>やめなさいよ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ううむ この こうけい<CD>何だか 貝おぼえが あるなぁ
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Stop it!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Hmm, I feel like I've seen this scene before.

Original: <@RL,Lady3,00>ちょっと あんた 男でしょ!<CD>貝てないで 止めなさいよ!
Translated: <@RL,Lady3,00>Hey, aren't you a man!?<D3>Quit watching and do something!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>わっ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Woah!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>まだまだ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>You aren't done yet!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>やるな! お前 だけど<CD>おれの メロンは かえってこない
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>You're not bad!<D3>But my melon isn't coming back.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>また ミニミニマシ-ンを 使った<CD>ミニロボ団の しわざだな!<CF><D1>はかせの所に 行って<CD>ミニミニマシ-ンを もらってこよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>The Mini Robos are at it again with the MiniMini Machine!<CF><D1>Let's go to the professor and get the MiniMini Machine!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>おれの マスクメロ-ンッ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>My muskmelon!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>おれの マスクメロン かえせよ!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>Give back my muskmelon!

Original: <@RL,Man3,00>だから おれじゃないって!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>いいかげんに やめなさいよ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ちょっと どいて!
Translated: <@RL,Man3,00>I told you it wasn't me!<CF><D1><@RL,Lady3,00>Enough already!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Hey, move aside!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>...ロボ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>貝つけたぞ ロボロボ団!
